rdf:Description.dc:title: Water management in Alberta : challenges for the future 1991 challenges for the future /
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Environment.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Tabled March 30, 1992 by the Hon. Ralph P. Klein.
This document outlines present government policy concerning water resources development in Alberta and makes proposals for possible change in the process of creating environmental law on the subject.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Water
Water resources development
